entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is a phoenix that dived and attacked the Basilisk with its beak.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who was being threatened by the Basilisk and was trying to get help from someone.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is a person who was screaming at the Basilisk to leave Fawkes alone and kill Harry instead.

entities.name: basilisk
entities.description: The Basilisk is a snake that was attacking Fawkes and Harry with its fangs.

relationships.description: Fawkes attacked the Basilisk with its beak.
Riddle ordered the Basilisk to leave Fawkes alone and kill Harry instead.
Harry was being protected by Fawkes from the Basilisk.
